flow.description: Uses email + one-time code to obtain an auth key for accessing user/order data.

authKeyHandling.notes: Once obtained, the auth key can be reused to access the user's order/account data.

recommendedFlow: getAuthKey (only if user/order data is requested)
getUser / getOrder / cancelOrder (only with auth key)
safety: Do not assume availability, shipping or pricing without calling tools.
If a tool returns an error or missing data, ask the user for clarification or retry with corrected parameters.
